title: Mounted
description: When a handsome new trainer arrives at Bittersweet Farm, the competition between half-sisters is no longer limited to the show ring.Talia Margolin doesnâ€™t want to compete against her half-sister Greer Swope on horseback or off. The arrival of the attractive and talented new trainer makes that decision impossible to keep. Greer always gets what she wants. She had the last coach and what she wants now is Lockie Malone. Tali is willing to fight for Lockie but when sex is the weapon Greer uses, is Tali going to place second like always?Mature YA. Sexual situations.
author: Barbara Morgenroth
